metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15649 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Given an installed malicious file picker application, an attacker was able to steal and upload local files of their choosing, regardless of the actually files picked. *Note: This issue only affected Firefox for Android. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 68.11.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine sbeattie> Android only

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
